ygData.subject: Re: drinking?
ygData.msgSnippet: When I drink a little, my strength goes up and my intelligence goes down. When I drink a lot my strength goes up and my agility, dexterity, and intelligence go
ygData.messageBody:
When I drink a little, my strength goes up and my intelligence goes down. When I drink a lot my strength goes up and my agility, dexterity, and intelligence go down.


I have heard that drinking increases some stats and decreases others?
Does anyone know what stats and how much?
Does the alcolhol tolerance skill offset any of the penalties if so how much?
What is a good drink for raising skill and a good drink for actual use when going into combat?
Ken
